triage_summary.root_cause: The _sanitize_text function in src/flywheel/formatter.py only sanitizes C0 control characters (0x00-0x1f), DEL (0x7f), and C1 control characters (0x80-0x9f). It does NOT sanitize Unicode bidirectional text control characters (U+202A-U+202E, U+200E, U+200F) or zero-width characters (U+200B-U+200D, U+2060, U+FEFF). These characters can be exploited for visual spoofing/Trojan Source attacks by reordering displayed text to hide malicious content.
triage_summary.affected_code: src/flywheel/formatter.py:34 - The conditional check only covers ranges 0x00-0x1f, 0x7f-0x9f
risk_points: Bidirectional override characters (U+202A-U+202E) can reverse text direction, hiding malicious content
Zero-width characters (U+200B-U+200D, U+FEFF) are invisible and can be used for obfuscation
Direction markers (U+200E, U+200F) can affect text rendering without visible characters
